CustomField.formula: CASE(Stage_Number__c,1,"Prospecting", 2,"Opportunity Identified", 3,"Proposal Submitted", 4,"Negotiation", 5,"Verbal Commitment", 6,"Closed Won", 7,"Closed Lost", 8,"Declined", 9,"Prospect", 10,"Credentials/Meeting", 11,"RFP/Pitch", 12,"Active Scope", 13,"Closed Won - Reconciled", 14,"Cancelled", 15,"Closed Won - Project Complete", 16,"Initial Contact", 17,"Term Negotiation", 18,"Final Version/Term Sheet", 19,"Execution - Signature", 20,"Execution - Countersignature", "error")
CustomField.label: Stage Value
